      • run

        @GetMapping
public void run()
        The main run method to start the app

      • startGame

        private void startGame()
        Method starts a game of bulls and cows, will set up the initial conditions for a game and creates a new game object to track the info. Then it will go through each round of the game, It will return the result of the guess to the user. If correct, will return a win result to user and database. otherwise, will return the result to user and do another round. If the user runs out of rounds, it will return not win result to database if the number of guesses run out.

      • startNewGame

        @PostMapping("/startNewGame")
@ResponseStatus(CREATED)
private Game startNewGame()
        Starts a new game by initialing a new game object for the class currentGame object

      • playSingleRound

        @PostMapping("/makeGuess")
private java.lang.String playSingleRound​(int userGuess)
        Makes a single guess for the current game object, and returns the result of the guess as a string
        Parameters:
        userGuess - the guess as an int
        Returns:
        the string result of the guess

      • displayListGame

        @GetMapping("/allGames")
private java.util.List<Game> displayListGame()
        Display the results of all the games in the database
        Returns:
        the list of all the games

      • displaySingleGame

        private void displaySingleGame()
        Asks user for a game id, then will print the game details of that id. If no game exist for that id, it will display an error message and return user to main menu

      • showSinlgeGame

        @GetMapping("/getSingleGame/{id}")
private Game showSinlgeGame​(@PathVariable

                     throws BullsCowsDataException

        Parameters:

        Returns:
